module.name: Call Forward
module.changelog: *2.5.0* localization fixes, Swedish *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.1.2* #2321 fixed CF AMPUSER(number) issue, syntax problem *1.1.1.2* changed categories *1.1.1.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.1* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.1* First release for 2.2
